CSS Layouts and Modern CSS

  • CSS Grid
  • Flexbox
  • Floats

Today we‚Äôll be going through 3 different CSS properties and using them for layouts

CSS grid is great for two dimensional layouts, and laying out the whole page

Flexbox is great to use as a fallback for CSS Grid, and is also really useful for flowing content in one direction

And although they get a bad reputation, floats still have a place in modern layouts, so we‚Äôre going to go through where you can use them as well

https://github.com/amykapernick/modern_fundamentals_css_layouts
